tav.name: TAV Technologies
tav.description: I developed and optimized reusable Vue.js components with Vuex state management and API integration, focusing on performance optimization to enhance responsiveness, while actively contributing to team collaboration and embracing a strong, solution-oriented work culture.

ravenFrontend.name: Raven Technology
ravenFrontend.description: I actively contributed to the full lifecycle development of modern, responsive UI components using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, implemented robust state management for seamless data flow, and collaborated with backend developers to optimize API consumption, enhancing overall performance and responsiveness.

ravenBackend.name: Raven Technology
ravenBackend.description: I developed and optimized RESTful APIs to improve communication between frontend and backend systems, worked extensively with MongoDB for efficient data management, collaborated with frontend developers to integrate APIs for better performance, and strengthened my debugging and problem-solving skills by resolving backend issues affecting the user interface.
